content.text:
Let me analyze the structure and provide step-by-step instructions to build it.

Structure Analysis:
- The structure has 4 distinct layers
- Bottom layer: Red bridge-like piece with three arches
- Second layer: Red arch piece with a green horizontal block
- Third layer: Two green vertical pillars with a yellow horizontal block on top
- Top layer: Orange triangular/roof piece

Block Selection and Assembly Order:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (red bridge piece, left side)
    Step2: Move block with index 2 (red bridge piece, middle)
    Step3: Move block with index 1 (red bridge piece, right side)
    Step4: Move block with index 8 (green horizontal block)
    Step5: Move block with index 3 (red arch piece)
    Step6: Move block with index 5 (green vertical pillar, left)
    Step7: Move block with index 6 (green vertical pillar, right)
    Step8: Move block with index 10 (yellow horizontal block)
    Step9: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular roof piece)
}

The assembly progresses from bottom to top, starting with the base bridge structure, then building up through the layers to the decorative roof piece. Each piece is used exactly as shown in the dictionary without any rotation.
